original_text: Now the king of Israel and Jehoshaphat the king of Judah were sitting on their thrones, arrayed in their robes. And they were sitting at the threshing floor at the entrance of the gate of Samaria, and all the prophets were prophesying before them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕과 유다 왕 여호사밧이 왕복을 입고 사마리아 성문 어귀 광장에서 각기 보좌에 앉았고 여러 선지자들이 그 앞에서 예언을 하는데

sentences.original_text: and Jehoshaphat the king of Judah
And they were sitting at the threshing floor
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 타작 마당에 앉아 있었는데

sentences.original_text: at the entrance of the gate of Samaria
and all the prophets were prophesying
